title: Add Founder Dilkhush photo static assets and wire into existing OwnerPhoto usage

requirements.summary: Add the generated Founder Dilkhush photo assets and use them everywhere the app currently renders the default owner photo (header, About, and Meet-the-Owners).
acceptanceCriteria: A square, web-optimized founder photo file exists under frontend/public/assets/ (use the generated filename from this build request).

All places that render the generic/default OwnerPhoto (e.g., header OwnerPhoto and About section OwnerPhoto in frontend/src/App.tsx) use the Founder Dilkhush imageSrc and an alt text of "Founder Dilkhush".
On image load failure, the UI still falls back to /assets/generated/profile-placeholder.dim_512x512.png as implemented in frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx.

file_operations.description: Add the generated square 512x512 Founder Dilkhush headshot image at this exact path so it is served as a static public asset.
Add the generated square 128x128 Founder Dilkhush headshot image at this exact path so it is served as a static public asset.

Update all existing <OwnerPhoto /> usages that currently rely on the generic/default owner photo (header, About, and the Dilkhush card in Meet the Owners) to explicitly pass imageSrc pointing to the new Founder Dilkhush public asset and alt="Founder Dilkhush". Prefer the 128x128 asset for the small header avatar and the 512x512 asset for larger displays.
Centralize public-path constants for owner/founder images (e.g., founderDilkhush512, founderDilkhush128) to avoid scattered string paths and ensure consistent reuse across the app.

requirements.summary: Change OwnerPhoto default imageSrc to the new Founder Dilkhush static asset and remove the old default reference.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx default imageSrc points to the new founder image asset path.
No references to /assets/IMG-20260207-WA0000.jpg remain as the default fallback in OwnerPhoto.

file_operations.description: Update the default value for the imageSrc prop to point to the new Founder Dilkhush static asset (public-path URL). Keep the existing onError fallback behavior that switches to /assets/generated/profile-placeholder.dim_512x512.png.
Ensure the exported Founder Dilkhush asset paths match the generated filenames and are used as the OwnerPhoto default imageSrc source of truth.

requirements.summary: Ensure the founder photo is rendered from frontend/public assets via a public-path URL, with no backend involvement.
acceptanceCriteria: The founder image is referenced via a public-path URL (e.g., /assets/...) and loads in production builds without any backend changes.

file_operations.description: Define/confirm that the Founder Dilkhush image paths are public-path URLs (e.g., starting with /assets/...) suitable for production static serving.
Ensure founder image references use the public-path URLs from frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts (not imports, not backend-routed URLs), so the images load from frontend/public in production builds.
Ensure the OwnerPhoto default imageSrc and runtime src selection use public-path URLs only, preserving the existing placeholder fallback on load error.
